title: New: Frank Ocean – Thinking About You
body:
**Frank Ocean** is fast becoming the prince of Rn’B.

A writer credit on **Beyoncé’s** latest album, as well as a guest spot on the debut **Watch The Throne** LP and you’ve got yourself a star. The latest tune to drop from **Ocean**, manages to again create the child like emotional time warp that makes his music so captivating. “A tornado flew around my room, before you came in” insists at the beginning of the track, it’s this, along with his divine voice that makes him so fucking irresistible.

Stream the track below.
